query:
ALTER TABLE `stockTransfers` 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `approvedBy` int,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `approvedAt` timestamp NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `rejectedBy` int,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `rejectedAt` timestamp NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `fromLevel` enum('warehouse','operator','machine'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `toLevel` enum('warehouse','operator','machine'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `fromLocationId` int,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `toLocationId` int
command:

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `approvedBy` int,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `approvedAt` timestamp NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `rejectedBy` int,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `rejectedAt` timestamp NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `fromLevel` enum('warehouse','operator','machine'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `toLevel` enum('warehouse','operator','machine'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `fromLocationId` int,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `toLocationId` int
